meanings: (하찮다) trivial, petty, insignificant, (진부하다) banal, (재미없다) dull, boring

vlive.korean: 시시한 얘기 다 해도 돼? Can I tell you all the lame things? 듣기 View video AOA : 엘비스랑수다떨고싶은데나보러와줄래?
vlive.english: Can I tell you all the lame things?

vlive.korean: 나 무슨 일 있을 때마다 시시한 얘기 다 해도 돼? Whenever something happens... Can I tell you all the lame things? 듣기 View video AOA : 엘비스랑수다떨고싶은데나보러와줄래?
vlive.english: Whenever something happens... Can I tell you all the lame things?

vlive.korean: 굉장히 시시한... 시시하다고 생각하실 수도 있어요. Boring... You may think it's boring. 듣기 View video BTOB : <일훈 'Fancy Shoes' 런칭 전야제>
vlive.english: Boring... You may think it's boring.

vlive.korean: [빠져버린 오해의 늪] - 아니야? - 우리끼리 시시하게 그런... [The maze of misunderstandings] - No? - Hey, it is not... 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2019 - EP.88
vlive.english: [The maze of misunderstandings] - No? - Hey, it is not...

vlive.korean: 시시하죠? It sounds pretty boring, huh? 듣기 View video iKON : KONIC TV 오픈방송

examples.korean: His speech was one of great triviality. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그의 연설은 대단히 시시한 것이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: His speech was one of great triviality. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They exchanged banalities for a couple of minutes. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 잠깐 동안 시시한 말들을 주고받았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They exchanged banalities for a couple of minutes. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It’s only a Mickey Mouse job. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그건 그냥 시시한 직장이야. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It’s only a Mickey Mouse job. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Why do strong arms fatigue themselves with frivolous dumbbells? To dig a vineyard is worthier exercise for men. (Marcus Valerius Martialis) 듣기 Add to Wordbook 왜 힘깨나 쓰는 사람들은 시시한 아령이나 들며 스스로를 지치게 할까? 차라리 포도원을 일구는 게 더 가치있는 운동인 것을. (마르쿠스 발레리우스 마르티알리스, 노력명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: Why do strong arms fatigue themselves with frivolous dumbbells? To dig a vineyard is worthier exercise for men. (Marcus Valerius Martialis) Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He does not condescend to such little things. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 그런 시시한 것들은 거들떠보지도 않는다. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He does not condescend to such little things. Add to Wordbook
